type: IM/IT Professional services for ATSSC - TBIPS
description: Requirement Details  Tendering Procedure:#  Selective Tendering  This requirement is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following category(ies)  Core: One (1) B.3 Level 3 Business Consultant One (1) B.6 Level 3 Business Systems Analyst One (1) P.5 Level 3 Project Executive One (1) P.9 Level 3 Project Manager Additional: One (1) B.1 Level 3 Business Analyst One (1) B.7 Level 3 Business Transformation Architect One (1) C.3 Level 3 IT Security Threat and Risk Assessment and Certification and Accreditation Analyst
